languages.text: {n}Бросив брезгливый взгляд на одетые на вас {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}одеяния еретиков{/d}, он негромко комментирует:{/n} "Не рекомендовал бы злоупотреблять подобной маскировкой. Слыхали, что маски умеют прирастать к лицу?"

{n}He casts a repulsed glance at the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}heretical garb{/d} you are wearing and comments softly,{/n} "I would also advise against this type of disguise. Haven't you ever heard the adage 'the mask becomes the face'?"
languages.original_text: {n}Бросив брезгливый взгляд на одетые на вас {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}одеяния еретиков{/d}, он негромко комментирует:{/n} "Не рекомендовал бы злоупотреблять подобной маскировкой. Слыхали, что маски умеют прирастать к лицу?"

traits.locale_text: {n}He casts a repulsed glance at the heretical garb you're wearing and comments softly,{/n} "I'd also recommend against this variety of disguise. You might've heard the adage that a mask can grow into a face."

{n}He casts a repulsed glance at the heretical garb you're wearing and comments softly,{/n} "I'd also recommend against this variety of disguise. You might've heard the adage that a mask can grow into a face."

{n}He casts a repulsed glance at the heretical garb you are wearing and comments softly,{/n} "I would also advise against this type of disguise. Haven't you ever heard the adage 'the mask becomes the face'?"

{n}He casts a repulsed glance at the heretical garb you are wearing and comments softly,{/n} "I would also advise against this type of disguise. Haven't you ever heard the adage 'the mask becomes the face'?"

{n}He casts a repulsed glance at the heretical garb you are wearing and comments softly,{/n} "I would also advise against this type of disguise. Haven't you ever heard the adage 'the mask becomes the face'?"

languages.text: {n}他厌恶地看了一眼你身上{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}异端分子的服饰{/d}，低声评论道。{/n}“此外，我建议你不要穿这样的衣服。莫非你从来没听说过‘面具戴久了就会变成脸’这句谚语吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}He casts a repulsed glance at the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}heretical garb{/d} you are wearing and comments softly,{/n} "I would also advise against this type of disguise. Haven't you ever heard the adage 'the mask becomes the face'?"

traits.locale_text: {/n}他厌恶地看了一眼你身上异端分子的服饰，低声评论道。{n}“此外，我建议你不要穿这样的衣服。莫非你从来没听说过‘面具戴久了就会变成脸’这句谚语吗？”

languages.text: {n}Lanza una mirada de desprecio a tus {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}vestimentas heréticas{/d} y comenta con suavidad:{/n} «Tampoco recomiendo esta clase de disfraz. ¿No ha oído eso de que la máscara se acaba convirtiendo en la cara?».
languages.original_text: {n}He casts a repulsed glance at the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}heretical garb{/d} you are wearing and comments softly,{/n} "I would also advise against this type of disguise. Haven't you ever heard the adage 'the mask becomes the face'?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Lanza una mirada de desprecio a tus vestimentas heréticas y comenta con suavidad:{/n} «Tampoco recomiendo esta clase de disfraz. ¿No ha oído eso de que la máscara se acaba convirtiendo en la cara?».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたが着ている{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}異端者の服装{/d}を忌々しそうにちらりと見る。{/n}「我からも言わせていただくが、そんな変装はやめた方がいいでしょう。『仮面は顔になる』、って格言を聞いたことは？」
languages.original_text: {n}He casts a repulsed glance at the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}heretical garb{/d} you are wearing and comments softly,{/n} "I would also advise against this type of disguise. Haven't you ever heard the adage 'the mask becomes the face'?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはあなたが着ている異端者の服装を忌々しそうにちらりと見る。{/n}「俺からも言わせてもらうと、そんな変装はやめておけ。”仮面は顔になる”、って格言を聞いたことはないか？」

languages.text: {n}Il lance un regard de dégoût à votre {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}tenue d'hérétique{/d} et remarque tout bas :{/n} « Je vous déconseille également de porter ce genre de déguisement. N'avez-vous jamais entendu dire qu'un masque porté trop longtemps finit par devenir votre vrai visage ? »
languages.original_text: {n}He casts a repulsed glance at the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}heretical garb{/d} you are wearing and comments softly,{/n} "I would also advise against this type of disguise. Haven't you ever heard the adage 'the mask becomes the face'?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il lance un regard de dégoût à votre tenue d'hérétique et remarque tout bas :{/n} « Je vous déconseille également de porter ce genre de déguisement. N'avez-vous jamais entendu dire qu'un masque porté trop longtemps finit par devenir votre vrai visage ? »

languages.text: {n}Er wirft einen abschätzigen Blick auf deine {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}ketzerische Kleidung{/d} und kommentiert leise:{/n} "Ich würde zudem von dieser Art der Verkleidung abraten. Habt Ihr noch nie gehört, dass die Maske rasch zum Gesicht werden kann?"
languages.original_text: {n}He casts a repulsed glance at the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}heretical garb{/d} you are wearing and comments softly,{/n} "I would also advise against this type of disguise. Haven't you ever heard the adage 'the mask becomes the face'?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er wirft einen abschätzigen Blick auf deine Ketzerkleidung und kommentiert leise:{/n} "Ich würde zudem von dieser Art der Verkleidung abraten. Habt Ihr noch nie gehört, dass die Maske rasch zum Gesicht werden kann?"

languages.original_text: {n}He casts a repulsed glance at the heretical garb you are wearing and comments softly,{/n} "I would also advise against this type of disguise. Haven't you ever heard the adage 'the mask becomes the face'?"

languages.text: {n}Üzerindeki, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}kâfirlere yakışır kıyafete{/d} tiksinen bir bakış atıyor ve yumuşak bir sesle ekliyor.{/n} "Ayrıca yerinizde olsam bu tür tebdillere başvurmazdım. 'Kör ile yatan şaşı kalkar' atasözünden haberiniz yok mu?"
languages.original_text: {n}He casts a repulsed glance at the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CultistClothes}heretical garb{/d} you are wearing and comments softly,{/n} "I would also advise against this type of disguise. Haven't you ever heard the adage 'the mask becomes the face'?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Üzerindeki, kâfirlere yakışır kıyafete itici bir bakış atıyor ve yumuşak bir sesle ekliyor:{/n} "Ayrıca yerinizde olsam bu tür tebdillere başvurmazdım. 'Kör ile yatan şaşı kalkar' atasözünden haberiniz yok mu?"
